title: UNC Charlotte: 24/7 IT Support with AI
excerpt: How UNC Charlotte transformed IT support with AI-powered knowledge and Agentforce availability to deliver 24/7 excellence.

hero.title: Transforming Higher Education IT Support
hero.subhead: How UNC Charlotte achieved 24/7 excellence through AI implementation—combining Einstein, Data Cloud knowledge, and Agentforce availability for real outcomes.

image.alt: UNC Charlotte and Green Irony company logos

sections.title: As a leading research institution, UNC Charlotte faced the universal higher education challenge of delivering responsive IT support despite limited resources. With thousands of students, faculty, and staff requiring assistance at all hours, their existing support infrastructure couldn’t scale to meet demand—especially outside regular hours when support staff availability was limited. The university needed to transform their approach to knowledge management and support delivery while demonstrating clear ROI to institutional leadership.
The Solution
sections.bodyBefore: Green Irony partnered with UNC Charlotte’s Office of the CIO to bridge the gap between technology promises and practical outcomes. Our implementation approach focused on three strategic pillars:

bullets.title: Foundation Building
bullets.body: We integrated Einstein AI capabilities into Service Cloud, creating an intelligent system that could understand and respond to common support inquiries with human-like comprehension.

bullets.title: Knowledge Architecture
bullets.body: Rather than simply deploying AI, we developed a Data Cloud-backed knowledge base that ensures the AI always accesses the most current, accurate information—transforming thousands of FAQs and knowledge articles into actionable intelligence.

bullets.title: Agentforce Availability
bullets.body: We implemented a public-facing Agentforce chat agent that provides 24/7 support with a conversational interface, designed specifically for the unique needs of students, faculty, and staff.

sections.bodyAfter: This implementation transformed theoretical AI potential into practical support solutions, aligned with UNC Charlotte’s vision for academic and operational excellence.

sections.title: Measurable Transformation
sections.bodyBefore: UNC Charlotte’s IT transformation turned a once-overwhelming support model into a strategic advantage:

bullets.title: Enhanced user experience for students, faculty, and staff
Foundation laid for future AI integrations and innovations
